name: 林群哲
objective:
課程大綱：本課程針對高分子及複合材料，對其基本原理、性質及應用，作系統性介紹。內容包括材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），完整地呈現此課程。
Syllabus：
This course targets at the brief introduction to the fundamental principles, characteristics and application of the polymer and composite material. This course includes the material manufacturing process and application, the physic property (optical, electrical, magnetic and thermal property), mechanical property (strength, ductility, hardness, toughness, fatigue, and creep). It is a perfect course.
